reviewText: An outstanding effort. Beautifully shot and acted. Top-notch screenwriter's and director's job. The tension just never lets go. Better than any thriller in recent memory.
Excellent movie, excellent sales, arrived very quickly would do business again
Excellent film, but the language is Farsi, not Hebrew.
The actors did a good job.  The cinematography was sharp.  I'd give this three stars, but enjoyed it a bit more than that so I went to four.
